99 Puppies.Name: 99 Puppies
99 Puppies.Flavor_Text:
"Two, four, six, plus three is nine, plus two is 11 . . ."
-Roger
99 Puppies.Body_Text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, gain 1 lore.

A Whole New World.Name: A Whole New World
A Whole New World.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards.

Abu - Mischievous Monkey.Name: Abu - Mischievous Monkey
Abu - Mischievous Monkey.Flavor_Text:
"Someday, Abu, things are gonna change. We'll be rich, live in a palace, and never have any problems at all."
-Aladdin

Agrabah - Marketplace.Name: Agrabah - Marketplace
Agrabah - Marketplace.Flavor_Text:
"Welcome to Agrabah, city of mystery, of enchantment, and the finest merchandise this side of the river."
-Merchant

Airfoil.Name: Airfoil
Airfoil.Flavor_Text: Discovered in the lost Sea Duck, it looked good as new.
Airfoil.Body_Text: I Got To Be Going - {e}: If you've played 2 or more actions this turn, draw a card.

Aladdin - Cornered Swordsman.Name: Aladdin - Cornered Swordsman
Aladdin - Cornered Swordsman.Flavor_Text:
"Oh ho! So the street rat found a sword and a backbone!" 
-Razoul

Aladdin - Heroic Outlaw.Name: Aladdin - Heroic Outlaw
Aladdin - Heroic Outlaw.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.) 

Daring Exploit - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore and each opponent loses 2 lore

Aladdin - Prince Ali.Name: Aladdin - Prince Ali
Aladdin - Prince Ali.Flavor_Text: Fabulously wealthy. Practically untouchable. Genuinely inauthentic.
Aladdin - Prince Ali.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Aladdin - Street Rat.Name: Aladdin - Street Rat
Aladdin - Street Rat.Flavor_Text: It can be hard to tell the difference between a diamond in the rough and someone who's just, well, rough.
Aladdin - Street Rat.Body_Text: Improvise - When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

Alice - Growing Girl.Name: Alice - Growing Girl
Alice - Growing Girl.Body_Text: Good Advice - Your other characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.) What Did I Do? - While this character has 10 {s} or more, she gets +4 {l}.

Alice - Tea Alchemist.Name: Alice - Tea Alchemist
Alice - Tea Alchemist.Flavor_Text: With the right tea leaves and a little magic, she creates the perfect cup for any party guest.
Alice - Tea Alchemist.Body_Text: Curiouser And Curiouser - {e}: Exert chosen opposing character and all other opposing characters with the same name.

And Then Along Came Zeus.Name: And Then Along Came Zeus
And Then Along Came Zeus.Flavor_Text:
He hurled his thunderbolt - He zapped
Locked those suckers in a vault - They're trapped
And on his own stopped chaos in its tracks
And Then Along Came Zeus.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Deal 5 damage to chosen character or location.

Anna - Heir to Arendelle.Name: Anna - Heir to Arendelle
Anna - Heir to Arendelle.Body_Text: Loving Heart - When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.

Archimedes - Highly Educated Owl.Name: Archimedes - Highly Educated Owl
Archimedes - Highly Educated Owl.Flavor_Text: "Flying is not merely some crude, mechanical process. It is a delicate art. Purely aesthetic. Poetry of motion. And the best way to learn it is to do it!"

Ariel - Adventurous Collector.Name: Ariel - Adventurous Collector
Ariel - Adventurous Collector.Flavor_Text: Shipwrecks are great places to find lore - and hide from sharks!
Ariel - Adventurous Collector.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Inspiring Voice - Whenever you play a song, chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.

Ariel - On Human Legs.Name: Ariel - On Human Legs
Ariel - On Human Legs.Body_Text: Voiceless - This character can't {e} to sing songs.

Ariel - Spectacular Singer.Name: Ariel - Spectacular Singer
Ariel - Spectacular Singer.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

Musical Debut - When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a song card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

Ariel - Whoseit Collector.Name: Ariel - Whoseit Collector
Ariel - Whoseit Collector.Body_Text: Look At This Stuff - Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.

Arthur - Trained Swordsman.Name: Arthur - Trained Swordsman
Arthur - Trained Swordsman.Flavor_Text: "It's not just fancy horses and swinging a sword around, you know! A true master must use his brain as well as his blade." - Merlin

Arthur - Wizard's Apprentice.Name: Arthur - Wizard's Apprentice
Arthur - Wizard's Apprentice.Flavor_Text: "Hmm.. what spell should I try next?"
Arthur - Wizard's Apprentice.Body_Text: Student: Whenever this character quests, you may return another chosen character of yours to your hand to gain 2 lore.

Audrey Ramirez - The Engineer.Name: Audrey Ramirez - The Engineer
Audrey Ramirez - The Engineer.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Spare Parts - Whenever this character quests, ready one of your items.

Aurelian Gyrosensor.Name: Aurelian Gyrosensor
Aurelian Gyrosensor.Flavor_Text:
"It can point you toward lost lore, but if you're not careful, it'll lead you off a cliff."
-Venturo, an Illumineer
Aurelian Gyrosensor.Body_Text: Seeking Knowledge - Whenever one of your characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

Aurora - Briar Rose.Name: Aurora - Briar Rose
Aurora - Briar Rose.Flavor_Text:
"There was something strange about that voice. Too beautiful to be real . . ."
-Prince Phillip
Aurora - Briar Rose.Body_Text: Disarming Beauty - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

Aurora - Dreaming Guardian.Name: Aurora - Dreaming Guardian
Aurora - Dreaming Guardian.Flavor_Text: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.
Aurora - Dreaming Guardian.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.) 

Protective Embrace - Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge)

Aurora - Regal Princess.Name: Aurora - Regal Princess
Aurora - Regal Princess.Flavor_Text: "They say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true!"

Ba-Boom!.Name: Ba-Boom!
Ba-Boom!.Body_Text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location

Baloo - Fun-Loving Bear.Name: Baloo - Fun-Loving Bear
Baloo - Fun-Loving Bear.Flavor_Text: "The bees are buzzin' in the tree to make some honey just for me!"

Baloo - von Bruinwald XIII.Name: Baloo - von Bruinwald XIII
Baloo - von Bruinwald XIII.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Let's Make Like A Tree - When this character is banished, gain 2 lore.

Bashful - Hopeless Romantic.Name: Bashful - Hopeless Romantic
Bashful - Hopeless Romantic.Body_Text: Oh, Gosh! - This character can't quest unless you have another Seven Dwarfs character in play.

Basil - Great Mouse Detective.Name: Basil - Great Mouse Detective
Basil - Great Mouse Detective.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
There's Always A Chance: If you used Shift to play this character, you may draw 2 cards when he enters play.

Basil - Of Baker Street.Name: Basil - Of Baker Street
Basil - Of Baker Street.Flavor_Text: "What an ingenious device! If its light is refracted through these, then its images must resolve somewhere below."
Basil - Of Baker Street.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

Basil - Perceptive Investigator.Name: Basil - Perceptive Investigator
Basil - Perceptive Investigator.Flavor_Text: "There is no question: something is afoot in the Great Illuminary"

Be Our Guest.Name: Be Our Guest
Be Our Guest.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.) 

Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

Be Prepared.Name: Be Prepared
Be Prepared.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Banish all Characters.

Beast - Forbidding Recluse.Name: Beast - Forbidding Recluse
Beast - Forbidding Recluse.Flavor_Text: Woe to the one who draws his gaze.
Beast - Forbidding Recluse.Body_Text: You're Not Welcome Here: When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

Beast - Hardheaded.Name: Beast - Hardheaded
Beast - Hardheaded.Flavor_Text: "She'll never see me as anything . . . but a monster."
Beast - Hardheaded.Body_Text: Break - When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

Beast - Relentless.Name: Beast - Relentless
Beast - Relentless.Body_Text: Second Wind: Whenever an opposing character is damaged, you may ready this character.

Beast - Selfless Protector.Name: Beast - Selfless Protector
Beast - Selfless Protector.Flavor_Text: "You'll have to go through me first."
Beast - Selfless Protector.Body_Text: Shield Another: Whenever one of your other character would be dealt damage, put that many damage counters on this character instead.

Beast - Tragic Hero.Name: Beast - Tragic Hero
Beast - Tragic Hero.Flavor_Text: "It must be my destiny–to remain a beast forever."
Beast - Tragic Hero.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Beast.)
It's Better This Way: At the start of your turn, if this character has no damage, draw a card. Otherwise, he gets +4 {s} this turn.

Beast - Wolfsbane.Name: Beast - Wolfsbane
Beast - Wolfsbane.Flavor_Text: "I'll take on all of you if I have to!"
Beast - Wolfsbane.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Roar - When you play this character, exert all opposing damaged characters.

Beast's Mirror.Name: Beast's Mirror
Beast's Mirror.Flavor_Text: Ashamed of his monstrous form, the Beast concealed himself inside his castle, with a magic mirror as his only window to the outside world.
Beast's Mirror.Body_Text: Show Me - {e}, 3 {i} - If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

Befuddle.Name: Befuddle
Befuddle.Flavor_Text: Never be afraid to have your mind boggled now and then.
Befuddle.Body_Text: Return a character or item with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

Belle - Bookworm.Name: Belle - Bookworm
Belle - Bookworm.Flavor_Text: There's nothing more tempting than a pile of unread books.
Belle - Bookworm.Body_Text: Use Your Imagination: While an opponent has no cards in their hand, this character gets +2 {l}.

Belle - Hidden Archer.Name: Belle - Hidden Archer
Belle - Hidden Archer.Flavor_Text: She slips through the trees as easily as shadow.
Belle - Hidden Archer.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.)
Thorny Arrows: Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging character's player discards all cards in their hand.

Belle - Inventive Engineer.Name: Belle - Inventive Engineer
Belle - Inventive Engineer.Flavor_Text: A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world.
Belle - Inventive Engineer.Body_Text: Tinker - Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

Belle - Strange but special.Name: Belle - Strange but special
Belle - Strange but special.Flavor_Text: "Far-off places, daring sword fights, magic spells, a prince in disguise . . ."
Belle - Strange but special.Body_Text:
Read A Book - During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

My Favorite Part! - While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 {l}.

Belle's House - Maurice's Workshop.Name: Belle's House - Maurice's Workshop
Belle's House - Maurice's Workshop.Flavor_Text: Some of the most important tools in Lorcana are crafted here.
Belle's House - Maurice's Workshop.Body_Text: Laboratory - If you have a character here, you pay 1{i} less to play items.

Benja - Guardian of the Dragon Gem.Name: Benja - Guardian of the Dragon Gem
Benja - Guardian of the Dragon Gem.Body_Text: We Have A Choice: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

Bernard - Brand-New Agent.Name: Bernard - Brand-New Agent
Bernard - Brand-New Agent.Flavor_Text: "You stay there. I'll look for scattered lore."
Bernard - Brand-New Agent.Body_Text: I'll Check It Out - At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours.

Bestow A Gift.Name: Bestow A Gift
Bestow A Gift.Flavor_Text:
"From magic ink I call this gift.
Fly my minion, thy wings be swift!"
-Maleficent
Bestow A Gift.Body_Text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo.Name: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo
Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo.Flavor_Text: It'll do magic, believe it or not
Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character of your to your hand to play another character with the same cost or less for free.

Billy Bones - Keeper of the Map.Name: Billy Bones - Keeper of the Map
Billy Bones - Keeper of the Map.Flavor_Text: "He's after me chest, that fiendish cyborg and his band of cutthroats."

Binding Contract.Name: Binding Contract
Binding Contract.Flavor_Text: Just a standard form, nothing to worry about.
Binding Contract.Body_Text: For All Eternity: {e}, {e} one of you character - Exert chosen character.

Blue Fairy - Rewarding Good Deeds.Name: Blue Fairy - Rewarding Good Deeds
Blue Fairy - Rewarding Good Deeds.Flavor_Text: "To make geppetto's wish come true will be entirely up to you." -Blue Fairy
Blue Fairy - Rewarding Good Deeds.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Ethereal Glow: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may draw a card.

Boss's Orders.Name: Boss's Orders
Boss's Orders.Flavor_Text:
"Snoops! I know you can look harder! Find me that lore!"
-Madame Medusa
Boss's Orders.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

Boun - Precocious Entrepreneur.Name: Boun - Precocious Entrepreneur
Boun - Precocious Entrepreneur.Flavor_Text: "If you see hungry faces, send 'em my way."

Bounce.Name: Bounce
Bounce.Flavor_Text:
"Are you ready for some bouncing?"
 - Tigger
Bounce.Body_Text: Return chosen character of yours to your hand to return another chosen character to their player's hand.

Break.Name: Break
Break.Flavor_Text: No one throws a tantrum like a beast.

Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor.Name: Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor
Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor.Flavor_Text: "There's a lot of nuance to squirrel." - Kronk
Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Squeak: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

Captain - Colonel's Lieutenant.Name: Captain - Colonel's Lieutenant
Captain - Colonel's Lieutenant.Flavor_Text: "Barking signal. It's an alert. Report to the Colonel at once!"

Captain Amelia - First in Command.Name: Captain Amelia - First in Command
Captain Amelia - First in Command.Flavor_Text: "I've spotted a strange structure on the horizon. Hard to port, helmsman!"
Captain Amelia - First in Command.Body_Text: Discipline - During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

Captain Hook - Captain of the Jolly Roge.Name: Captain Hook - Captain of the Jolly Roger
Captain Hook - Captain of the Jolly Roge.Flavor_Text: "A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We'll pot 'em like sitting ducks."
Captain Hook - Captain of the Jolly Roge.Body_Text: Double The Powder - When you play this character, you may return an action card named Fire the Cannons! from your discard to your hand.

Captain Hook - Forceful Duelist.Name: Captain Hook - Forceful Duelist
Captain Hook - Forceful Duelist.Flavor_Text: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament

Captain Hook - Master Swordsman.Name: Captain Hook - Master Swordsman
Captain Hook - Master Swordsman.Body_Text:
Nemesis - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

Man-To-Man - Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

Captain Hook - Ruthless Pirate.Name: Captain Hook - Ruthless Pirate
Captain Hook - Ruthless Pirate.Flavor_Text: "You wouldn't dare fight old hook man-to-man!"
Captain Hook - Ruthless Pirate.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

You Coward! - While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Evasive gain Reckless. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

Captain Hook - Thinking a Happy Thought.Name: Captain Hook - Thinking a Happy Thought
Captain Hook - Thinking a Happy Thought.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.) 

Challenger +3 When challenging, this character get +3 {s}.) 

Stolen Dust - Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.

Captain Hook's Rapier.Name: Captain Hook's Rapier
Captain Hook's Rapier.Body_Text:
Get Those Scurvy Brats! - During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may pay 1{i} to draw a  card.

Let's Have At It! - Your characters named Captain Hook gain Challenger +1. (They get +1{p} while challenging.)

Card Soldiers - Full Deck.Name: Card Soldiers - Full Deck
Card Soldiers - Full Deck.Flavor_Text: You'll have to deal with them sooner or later.

Cerberus - Three-Headed Dog.Name: Cerberus - Three-Headed Dog
Cerberus - Three-Headed Dog.Flavor_Text: Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting for the ball.

Charge!.Name: Charge!
Charge!.Flavor_Text: Sometime subtlety is required. This is not one of those times.
Charge!.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 this turn. (They get +2 {s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

Chernabog - Evildoer.Name: Chernabog - Evildoer
Chernabog - Evildoer.Body_Text:
The Power Of Evil - For each character card in your discard, you pay 1{i} less to play this character.

Summon The Spirits - When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.

Chernabog's Followers - Creatures of Evi.Name: Chernabog's Followers - Creatures of Evil
Chernabog's Followers - Creatures of Evi.Body_Text: Restless Souls - Whenever this character quests, you may banish them to draw a card.

Cheshire Cat - Always Grinning.Name: Cheshire Cat - Always Grinning
Cheshire Cat - Always Grinning.Flavor_Text: Alice felt quite confused. "But I don't see much ink here at all. How can the flood still be changing the Inklands?" "Things are always changing, you know," said the cat. "It would be a change if they didn't."

Cheshire Cat - From the Shadows.Name: Cheshire Cat - From the Shadows
Cheshire Cat - From the Shadows.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cheshire Cat.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Wicked Smile: {e} - Banish chosen damaged character.

Cheshire Cat - Not All There.Name: Cheshire Cat - Not All There
Cheshire Cat - Not All There.Flavor_Text: "You may have noticed that I'm not all there myself."
Cheshire Cat - Not All There.Body_Text: Lose Something? - When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

Chief Bogo - Respected Officer.Name: Chief Bogo - Respected Officer
Chief Bogo - Respected Officer.Flavor_Text: "We can confirm the ink flood was caused by an explosion. We have it under control–now clear the area."
Chief Bogo - Respected Officer.Body_Text: Insubordination!: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

Chief Tui - Proud of Motunui.Name: Chief Tui - Proud of Motunui
Chief Tui - Proud of Motunui.Flavor_Text: "Look at out home! There is no better place to be."

Chief Tui - Respected Leader.Name: Chief Tui - Respected Leader
Chief Tui - Respected Leader.Flavor_Text: "You can always rely on the strength of those who love you."
Chief Tui - Respected Leader.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character‘s {s} this turn.)

Christopher Robin - Adventurer.Name: Christopher Robin - Adventurer
Christopher Robin - Adventurer.Flavor_Text:
"Look, Pooh! Have you ever seen anything so grand?"
- Christopher Robin
Christopher Robin - Adventurer.Body_Text: We'll Always Be Together: Whenever you ready this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, gain 2 lore.

Cinderella - Ballroom Sensation.Name: Cinderella - Ballroom Sensation
Cinderella - Ballroom Sensation.Flavor_Text: With a magical dress and a song in her heart, she dazzled everyone at the ball.
Cinderella - Ballroom Sensation.Body_Text: Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)

Cinderella - Gentle and Kind.Name: Cinderella - Gentle and Kind
Cinderella - Gentle and Kind.Body_Text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

A Wonderful Dream - {e} - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen Princess character.

Cinderella - Knight In Training.Name: Cinderella - Knight In Training
Cinderella - Knight In Training.Flavor_Text: She's always had the heart of a champion–now she'll have the skills, too.
Cinderella - Knight In Training.Body_Text: Have Courage: When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

Cinderella - Stouthearted.Name: Cinderella - Stouthearted
Cinderella - Stouthearted.Body_Text: Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cinderella.) Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.) The Singing Sword: Whenever you play a song, this character may challenge ready characters this turn.

Cleansing Rainwater.Name: Cleansing Rainwater
Cleansing Rainwater.Flavor_Text: Rainwater lands as stone melts and dragons fly again.
Cleansing Rainwater.Body_Text: Ancient Power - Banish this item: Remove up to 2 damage from each of your characters.

Cobra Bubbles - Just a Social Worker.Name: Cobra Bubbles - Just a Social Worker
Cobra Bubbles - Just a Social Worker.Flavor_Text: "Let me get this straight. Your 'magic' spellbook got washed away in a flood of 'magic' ink?"

Coconut Basket.Name: Coconut Basket
Coconut Basket.Flavor_Text: The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything-including baskets to carry more coconuts.
Coconut Basket.Body_Text: Consider The Coconut - Whenever you play a character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

Cogsworth - Grandfather Clock.Name: Cogsworth - Grandfather Clock
Cogsworth - Grandfather Clock.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cogsworth.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Unwind: Your other characters gain Resist +1 (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1)

Cogsworth - Talking Clock.Name: Cogsworth - Talking Clock
Cogsworth - Talking Clock.Flavor_Text: "This has gone far enough. I'm in charge here."
Cogsworth - Talking Clock.Body_Text: Wait A Minute: Your characters with Reckless gain "{e} - Gain 1 lore."

Croquet Mallet.Name: Croquet Mallet
Croquet Mallet.Body_Text: Hurtling Hedgehog: Banish this item - Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

Cruella De Vil - Fashionable Cruiser.Name: Cruella De Vil - Fashionable Cruiser
Cruella De Vil - Fashionable Cruiser.Flavor_Text: "Isn't it just gorgeous darling? And just as stylish as I am."
Cruella De Vil - Fashionable Cruiser.Body_Text: Now Get Going: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

Cruella De Vil - Miserable as Usual.Name: Cruella De Vil - Miserable as Usual
Cruella De Vil - Miserable as Usual.Flavor_Text: When she stops by, misery is company.
Cruella De Vil - Miserable as Usual.Body_Text: You'll Be Sorry! - When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player's hand.

Cruella De Vil - Perfectly Wretched.Name: Cruella De Vil - Perfectly Wretched
Cruella De Vil - Perfectly Wretched.Flavor_Text: "It's ink couture, darling. I wear only the best!"
Cruella De Vil - Perfectly Wretched.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cruella De Vil.)
Oh, No You Don't: Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -2 {s} this turn.

Cubby - Mighty Lost Boy.Name: Cubby - Mighty Lost Boy
Cubby - Mighty Lost Boy.Flavor_Text: With Peter holding off Hook, Cubby did what he does best: break stuff.
Cubby - Mighty Lost Boy.Body_Text: The Bear - Whenever this character moves to a location, he gets +3{p} this turn.

Cursed Merfolk - Ursula's Handiwork.Name: Cursed Merfolk - Ursula's Handiwork
Cursed Merfolk - Ursula's Handiwork.Flavor_Text:
"Now it's happened once or twice, someone couldn't pay the price . . ."
-Ursula
Cursed Merfolk - Ursula's Handiwork.Body_Text: Poor Souls - Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

Cut To The Chase.Name: Cut To The Chase
Cut To The Chase.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

Daisy Duck - Secret Agent.Name: Daisy Duck - Secret Agent
Daisy Duck - Secret Agent.Body_Text: Thwart: Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger.Name: Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger
Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger.Flavor_Text: First they steal your heart. Then they steal your chair.
Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger.Body_Text: Where Did They All Come From? - You may have up to 99 copies of Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger in your deck.

De Vil Manor - Cruella's Estate.Name: De Vil Manor - Cruella's Estate
De Vil Manor - Cruella's Estate.Flavor_Text:
"They say the ol' place is haunted, or bewitched, or some such fiddle-faddle."
-Colonel

Della Duck - Unstoppable Mom.Name: Della Duck - Unstoppable Mom
Della Duck - Unstoppable Mom.Flavor_Text: "I survived the moon. How tough could the flooded Inklands be?"
Della Duck - Unstoppable Mom.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

Develop Your Brain.Name: Develop Your Brain
Develop Your Brain.Body_Text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other on the bottom of the deck.

Dewey - Showy Nephew.Name: Dewey - Showy Nephew
Dewey - Showy Nephew.Flavor_Text: "I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!"
Dewey - Showy Nephew.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

Diablo - Faithful Pet.Name: Diablo - Faithful Pet
Diablo - Faithful Pet.Flavor_Text: With a little ink-enhanced magic, nothing escapes his sight.

Maleficent - Mistress of All Evil.Name: Maleficent - Mistress of All Evil
Maleficent - Mistress of All Evil.Body_Text:
Dark Knowledge - Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card.

Divination - During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

Maleficent - Monstrous Dragon.Name: Maleficent - Monstrous Dragon
Maleficent - Monstrous Dragon.Flavor_Text: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.
Maleficent - Monstrous Dragon.Body_Text: Dragon Fire - When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.

Maleficent - Sinister Visitor.Name: Maleficent - Sinister Visitor
Maleficent - Sinister Visitor.Flavor_Text: "The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel. . . ."

Maleficent - Sorceress.Name: Maleficent - Sorceress
Maleficent - Sorceress.Flavor_Text: "You dare challenge me? Fool, my magic is more powerful than you could possibly imagine!"
Maleficent - Sorceress.Body_Text: Cast My Spell! - When you play this character, you may draw a card.

Maleficent - Uninvited.Name: Maleficent - Uninvited
Maleficent - Uninvited.Flavor_Text: She had no invitation-and needed no introduction.

Mama Odie - Mystical Maven.Name: Mama Odie - Mystical Maven
Mama Odie - Mystical Maven.Flavor_Text: "You dig a little deeper, you'll find everything you need."
Mama Odie - Mystical Maven.Body_Text: This Going To Be Good - Whenever you play a song, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom.Name: Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom
Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom.Flavor_Text: "That's the way to give it what it needs, Juju!"
Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom.Body_Text: Listen To Your Mama Now - Whenever this character quests, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

Map of Treasure Planet.Name: Map of Treasure Planet
Map of Treasure Planet.Flavor_Text:
"Gentlemen, this must be kept under lock and key."
-Captain Amelia
Map of Treasure Planet.Body_Text:
Key To The Portal - {e}: You pay 1{i} less for the next location you play this turn.

Show The Way - You pay 1{i} less to move your characters to a location.

Marshmallow - Persistent Guardian.Name: Marshmallow - Persistent Guardian
Marshmallow - Persistent Guardian.Flavor_Text:
"Hey! We were just talking about you! All good things, all good things." 
- Olaf
Marshmallow - Persistent Guardian.Body_Text: Durable - When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand.

Maui - Demigod.Name: Maui - Demigod
Maui - Demigod.Flavor_Text: When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat's owner is optional.

Maui - Hero to All.Name: Maui - Hero to All
Maui - Hero to All.Flavor_Text: "What I believe you were trying to say is 'Thank you.'"
Maui - Hero to All.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

Maui - Soaring Demigod.Name: Maui - Soaring Demigod
Maui - Soaring Demigod.Flavor_Text: "You got any more of those chickens hanging around?"
Maui - Soaring Demigod.Body_Text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

In Ma Belly - Whenever a character of yours named HeiHei quests, this character gets +1{l} and loses Reckless this turn.

Maui - Whale.Name: Maui - Whale
Maui - Whale.Flavor_Text: Always ready to make a splash.
Maui - Whale.Body_Text:
This Mission Is Cursed - This character can't ready at the start of your turn.

I Got Your Back - 2{i}: Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of the turn.

Maui's Fish Hook.Name: Maui's Fish Hook
Maui's Fish Hook.Body_Text:
It's Maui Time! - If you have a character named Maui in play, you may use this item's Shapeshift ability for free.

Shapeshift - {e}, 2{i}: Choose one:
- Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
- Chosen character gets +3{p} this turn.

Maui's Place of Exile - Hidden Island.Name: Maui's Place of Exile - Hidden Island
Maui's Place of Exile - Hidden Island.Flavor_Text: Nothing but boulders and sand - easy to miss.
Maui's Place of Exile - Hidden Island.Body_Text: Isolated - Characters gain Resist +1 while here. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

Maurice - World-Famous Inventor.Name: Maurice - World-Famous Inventor
Maurice - World-Famous Inventor.Body_Text:
Give It A Try - Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

It Works! - Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

Maurice's Workshop.Name: Maurice's Workshop
Maurice's Workshop.Flavor_Text: The solution you need could be just a few adjustments away.
Maurice's Workshop.Body_Text: Looking For This: Whenever you play another item, you may pay 1 {i} to draw a card.

Maximus - Palace Horse.Name: Maximus - Palace Horse
Maximus - Palace Horse.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

Maximus - Relentless Pursuer.Name: Maximus - Relentless Pursuer
Maximus - Relentless Pursuer.Flavor_Text: He pursues his quarry with courage, discipline, and a touch of class.
Maximus - Relentless Pursuer.Body_Text: Horse Kick - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

McDuck Manor - Scrooge's Mansion.Name: McDuck Manor - Scrooge's Mansion
McDuck Manor - Scrooge's Mansion.Flavor_Text:
"It's only the coolest home in Lorcana!"
-Webby Vanderquack

Megara - Pulling the Strings.Name: Megara - Pulling the Strings
Megara - Pulling the Strings.Flavor_Text: "A deal's a deal. But falling in love was never supposed to be a part of it."
Megara - Pulling the Strings.Body_Text: Wonder Boy - When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn.

Merlin - Crab.Name: Merlin - Crab
Merlin - Crab.Flavor_Text: He'll be out of this in a snap!
Merlin - Crab.Body_Text: Ready Or Not!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, chosen characters gain Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

Merlin - Goat.Name: Merlin - Goat
Merlin - Goat.Flavor_Text: "He always was a stubborn old goat." - Madam Mim
Merlin - Goat.Body_Text: Here I Come!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, gain 1 lore.

Merlin - Rabbit.Name: Merlin - Rabbit
Merlin - Rabbit.Flavor_Text: It was turning out to be a bad hare day.
Merlin - Rabbit.Body_Text: Hoppity Hip!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, you may draw a card.

Merlin - Self-Appointed Mentor.Name: Merlin - Self-Appointed Mentor
Merlin - Self-Appointed Mentor.Flavor_Text: "What a mess! What a medieval muddle! We'll have to modernize it."
Merlin - Self-Appointed Mentor.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

Merlin - Shapeshifter.Name: Merlin - Shapeshifter
Merlin - Shapeshifter.Flavor_Text: "Oh, blast it all - I can't make up my mind."
Merlin - Shapeshifter.Body_Text: Battle Of Wits: Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this characters get +1 {l} this turn.

Merlin - Squirrel.Name: Merlin - Squirrel
Merlin - Squirrel.Flavor_Text: "You can't always trust to luck, boy."
Merlin - Squirrel.Body_Text: Look Before You Leap: When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

Mickey Mouse - Artful Rogue.Name: Mickey Mouse - Artful Rogue
Mickey Mouse - Artful Rogue.Flavor_Text: Quiet as a... well, you know.
Mickey Mouse - Artful Rogue.Body_Text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) 

Misdirection - Whenever you play an action, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

Mickey Mouse - Brave Little Tailor.Name: Mickey Mouse - Brave Little Tailor
Mickey Mouse - Brave Little Tailor.Flavor_Text: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.
Mickey Mouse - Brave Little Tailor.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Mickey Mouse - Detective.Name: Mickey Mouse - Detective
Mickey Mouse - Detective.Flavor_Text: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.
Mickey Mouse - Detective.Body_Text: Get A Clue - When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Mickey Mouse - Friendly Face.Name: Mickey Mouse - Friendly Face
Mickey Mouse - Friendly Face.Flavor_Text: "Come on in- there's lots to explore."
Mickey Mouse - Friendly Face.Body_Text: Glad You're Here! - Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

Mickey Mouse - Musketeer.Name: Mickey Mouse - Musketeer
Mickey Mouse - Musketeer.Body_Text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

All For One - Your other musketeer character get +1 {s}.

Mickey Mouse - Stalwart Explorer.Name: Mickey Mouse - Stalwart Explorer
Mickey Mouse - Stalwart Explorer.Flavor_Text: Mickey knew just where to start searching for the Sorcerer's Hat, but he didn't expect it to be guarded.
Mickey Mouse - Stalwart Explorer.Body_Text: Let's Take A Look - This character gets +1{p} for each location you have in play.

Mickey Mouse - Steamboat Pilot.Name: Mickey Mouse - Steamboat Pilot
Mickey Mouse - Steamboat Pilot.Flavor_Text: On rivers throughout the Inklands, the little steamboat's whistle answers the cheery tunes of its pilot.

Mickey Mouse - True Friend.Name: Mickey Mouse - True Friend
Mickey Mouse - True Friend.Flavor_Text: As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

Mickey Mouse - Trumpeter.Name: Mickey Mouse - Trumpeter
Mickey Mouse - Trumpeter.Body_Text: Sound The Call - {e}, 2{i}: Play a character for free.

Mickey Mouse - Wayward Sorcerer.Name: Mickey Mouse - Wayward Sorcerer
Mickey Mouse - Wayward Sorcerer.Flavor_Text: He always goes for the clean sweep.
Mickey Mouse - Wayward Sorcerer.Body_Text:
Animate Broom - You pay 1 {i} less to play Broom characters.

Ceaseless Worker - Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

Milo Thatch - Clever Cartographer.Name: Milo Thatch - Clever Cartographer
Milo Thatch - Clever Cartographer.Flavor_Text: "Believe me, studying gibberish really can take you places!"

Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis.Name: Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis
Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis.Flavor_Text: "You don't know what you're tampering with."
Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.)

Take Them By Surprise - When this character is banished, return all opposing characters to their player's hands.

Milo Thatch - Spirited Scholar.Name: Milo Thatch - Spirited Scholar
Milo Thatch - Spirited Scholar.Flavor_Text: "My grandpa never told me about this place!"
Milo Thatch - Spirited Scholar.Body_Text: I'm Your Man! - While this character is at a location, he gets +2{p}.

Minnie Mouse - Always Classy.Name: Minnie Mouse - Always Classy
Minnie Mouse - Always Classy.Flavor_Text: Her fashion sense is always spot on.

Minnie Mouse - Beloved Princess.Name: Minnie Mouse - Beloved Princess
Minnie Mouse - Beloved Princess.Flavor_Text: Wherever the princess goes, her musketeers are . . . well, they're around somewhere, probably.

Minnie Mouse - Funky Spelunker.Name: Minnie Mouse - Funky Spelunker
Minnie Mouse - Funky Spelunker.Body_Text: Journey - While this character is at a location, she gets +2{p}.

Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist.Name: Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist
Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist.Flavor_Text: Her musical talents are off the charts!
Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist.Body_Text:
Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)

Entourage - Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

Minnie Mouse - Stylish Surfer.Name: Minnie Mouse - Stylish Surfer
Minnie Mouse - Stylish Surfer.Flavor_Text: "This goes into my top ten most fun things!"
Minnie Mouse - Stylish Surfer.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Minnie Mouse - Wide-Eyed Diver.Name: Minnie Mouse - Wide-Eyed Diver
Minnie Mouse - Wide-Eyed Diver.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
Evasive (Only Characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Undersea Adventure: Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2 {l} this turn.

Minnie Mouse - Zipping Around.Name: Minnie Mouse - Zipping Around
Minnie Mouse - Zipping Around.Flavor_Text: Zero to fun in under 3 seconds!

Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent.Name: Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent
Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent.Flavor_Text:
"Our society has never failed to answer a call for help."
-Mr. Chairman
Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent.Body_Text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

Moana - Born Leader.Name: Moana - Born Leader
Moana - Born Leader.Body_Text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.)

Welcome To My Boat - Whenever this character quests while at a location, ready all other characters here, they can't quest for the rest of this turn.

Moana - Chosen by the Ocean.Name: Moana - Chosen by the Ocean
Moana - Chosen by the Ocean.Body_Text: This Is Not Who You Are - When you play this character, you may banish chosen character named Te Ka.

Moana - Of Motunui.Name: Moana - Of Motunui
Moana - Of Motunui.Flavor_Text: "I am Moana of Motunui. You will board my boar, sail across the sea, and restore the heart of Te Fiti."
Moana - Of Motunui.Body_Text: We Can Fix It - Whenever this character quests, you may ready your other Princess Characters. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

Moana - Undeterred Voyager.Name: Moana - Undeterred Voyager
Moana - Undeterred Voyager.Flavor_Text: No fire or storm will keep her from her goal.
Moana - Undeterred Voyager.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Morph - Space Goo.Name: Morph - Space Goo
Morph - Space Goo.Body_Text: Mimicry - You may play any character with Shift on this character as if this character had any name.

Mother Gothel - Selfish Manipulator.Name: Mother Gothel - Selfish Manipulator
Mother Gothel - Selfish Manipulator.Body_Text: Skip The Drama, Stay With Mama - While this character is exerted, opposing characters can't quest.

Mother Gothel - Withered And Wicked.Name: Mother Gothel - Withered And Wicked
Mother Gothel - Withered And Wicked.Flavor_Text: Her feelings are written all over her face.
Mother Gothel - Withered And Wicked.Body_Text: What Have You Done?!: This character enters play with 3 damage.

Mother Knows Best.Name: Mother Knows Best
Mother Knows Best.Flavor_Text:
One way or another
Something will go wrong, I swear
Mother Knows Best.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Return chosen character to their player's hand.

Motunui - Island Paradise.Name: Motunui - Island Paradise
Motunui - Island Paradise.Body_Text: Reincarnation - Whenever a character is banished while here, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Mouse Armor.Name: Mouse Armor
Mouse Armor.Flavor_Text: Built by the tiniest of hands for the bravest of hearts.
Mouse Armor.Body_Text: Protection - {e}: Chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

Mr. Smee - Bumbling Mate.Name: Mr. Smee - Bumbling Mate
Mr. Smee - Bumbling Mate.Body_Text: Oh Dear, Dear, Dear - At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted and you don't have a Captain character in play, deal 1 damage to this character.

Mr. Smee - Loyal First Mate.Name: Mr. Smee - Loyal First Mate
Mr. Smee - Loyal First Mate.Flavor_Text:
"Mr. Smee is a kind, gentle soul who lives to bring comfort and aid to a twisted old villain. Now, what good is kindness like that?" 
- Peter Pan

Mr. Snoops - Inept Businessman.Name: Mr. Snoops - Inept Businessman
Mr. Snoops - Inept Businessman.Flavor_Text:
"This is simple, Snoops! I want that lore! The one that shines like a diamond!"
-Madame Medusa

Mrs. Judson - Housekeeper.Name: Mrs. Judson - Housekeeper
Mrs. Judson - Housekeeper.Flavor_Text: "I know just the thing. Let me fetch you a pot of tea and some of my fresh cheese crumpets."
Mrs. Judson - Housekeeper.Body_Text: Tidy Up: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Mufasa - Betrayed Leader.Name: Mufasa - Betrayed Leader
Mufasa - Betrayed Leader.Body_Text: The Sun Will Set - When this character is banished, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a character card, you may play that character for free and they enter play exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

Mufasa - Champion of the Pride Lands.Name: Mufasa - Champion of the Pride Lands
Mufasa - Champion of the Pride Lands.Flavor_Text: Even his name makes enemies quiver in fear.

Mufasa - King of the Pride Lands.Name: Mufasa - King of the Pride Lands
Mufasa - King of the Pride Lands.Flavor_Text: "A king must care for all of the creatures in his kingdom, no matter their size."

Mulan - Free Spirit.Name: Mulan - Free Spirit
Mulan - Free Spirit.Flavor_Text: Everything looks better when you're free to be yourself.
Mulan - Free Spirit.Body_Text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

Mulan - Imperial Soldier.Name: Mulan - Imperial Soldier
Mulan - Imperial Soldier.Body_Text: Lead By Example - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {l} this turn.

Mulan - Reflecting.Name: Mulan - Reflecting
Mulan - Reflecting.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)

Honor To The Ancestors - Whenever this character quests, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a song card, you may play it for free. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

Mulan - Soldier In Training.Name: Mulan - Soldier In Training
Mulan - Soldier In Training.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

Musketeer Tabard.Name: Musketeer Tabard
Musketeer Tabard.Flavor_Text: There's no such thing as a lone musketeer.
Musketeer Tabard.Body_Text: All For One And One For All - Whenever one of your characters with Bodyguard is banished, you may draw a card.

Namaari - Morning Mist.Name: Namaari - Morning Mist
Namaari - Morning Mist.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)\nBlades: This character can challenge ready characters.

Namaari - Nemesis.Name: Namaari - Nemesis
Namaari - Nemesis.Flavor_Text: "I don't need swords to beat you. They just make it more fun."
Namaari - Nemesis.Body_Text: This Shouldn't Take Long: {e}, Banish this character - Banish chosen character.

Nana - Darling Family Pet.Name: Nana - Darling Family Pet
Nana - Darling Family Pet.Flavor_Text: Children are a dog's best friend.
Nana - Darling Family Pet.Body_Text: Nursemaid - Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may remove all damage from chosen character.

Nani - Protective Sister.Name: Nani - Protective Sister
Nani - Protective Sister.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Never Land - Mermaid Lagoon.Name: Never Land - Mermaid Lagoon
Never Land - Mermaid Lagoon.Flavor_Text: The mermaids told Peter they'd seen some items floating by several days earlier, but they were more concerned that one of their sisters had gone missing.

Nick Wilde - Wily Fox.Name: Nick Wilde - Wily Fox
Nick Wilde - Wily Fox.Flavor_Text: "It's criminal how good these things taste!"
Nick Wilde - Wily Fox.Body_Text: It's Called A Hustle: When play this character, you may return an item card name Pawpsicle from your discard to your hand.

Noi - Orphaned Thief.Name: Noi - Orphaned Thief
Noi - Orphaned Thief.Body_Text: Hide And Seek: While you have an item in play, this character gains Resist +1 and Ward. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1. Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Nothing To Hide.Name: Nothing To Hide
Nothing To Hide.Body_Text: Each Opponent reveals their hand. Draw a card.

Nottingham - Prince John's Castle.Name: Nottingham - Prince John's Castle
Nottingham - Prince John's Castle.Flavor_Text:
Sir Hiss: "I say, sire, your mother's castle will be the perfect place to set up our scheme!"
Prince John: "Mommy!"

Olaf - Friendly Snowman.Name: Olaf - Friendly Snowman
Olaf - Friendly Snowman.Flavor_Text: "I'm Olaf and I like warm hugs!"

Olympus Would Be That Way.Name: Olympus Would Be That Way
Olympus Would Be That Way.Flavor_Text:
"Now that I set you free, what is the first thing you are going to do?"
-Hades
Olympus Would Be That Way.Body_Text: Your characters get +3{p} while challenging a location this turn.

On Your Feet Now!.Name: On Your Feet Now!
On Your Feet Now!.Body_Text: Ready all your characters and deal 1 damage to each of them. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

One Jump Ahead.Name: One Jump Ahead
One Jump Ahead.Flavor_Text:
Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat- 
Tell you all about it when I got the time
One Jump Ahead.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Orville - Ace Pilot.Name: Orville - Ace Pilot
Orville - Ace Pilot.Flavor_Text: "Boy, look at those things go! Whaddya call 'em? Inkrunners? I wish I could fly like that."

Owl - Logical Lecturer.Name: Owl - Logical Lecturer
Owl - Logical Lecturer.Flavor_Text: "For instance, based on the quality of the light and the subtle change in wind direction, I can safely say that it is time for tea."

Pacha - Village Leader.Name: Pacha - Village Leader
Pacha - Village Leader.Flavor_Text: "Don't be fooled by the folksy peasant look." - Kuzco

Pack Tactics.Name: Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.Flavor_Text:
Pacha: "You want to survive the jungle? Start thinking like you belong here."
Kuzco: "No problem... Grrr, look at me, I'm a jaguar."
Pack Tactics.Body_Text: Gain 1 lore for each damaged character opponents have in play.

Pain - Underworld Imp.Name: Pain - Underworld Imp
Pain - Underworld Imp.Flavor_Text:
"Get a move on! I'm a busy god, lots to do-meetings, curses, a little light scheming."
 - Hades
Pain - Underworld Imp.Body_Text: Coming, Your Most Lugubriousness: While this character has 5 {s} or more, he gets +2 {l}.

Painting the Roses Red.Name: Painting the Roses Red
Painting the Roses Red.Body_Text:
{A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Up to 2 chosen characters get -1 {s} this turn. Draw a card.

Panic - Underworld Imp.Name: Panic - Underworld Imp
Panic - Underworld Imp.Flavor_Text:
"Who says it's hard to find good help these days? Oh yeah... ME!"
 - Hades
Panic - Underworld Imp.Body_Text: I Can Handle It: When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn. If the chosen character is named Pain, he gets +4 {s} instead.

Part of Your World.Name: Part of Your World
Part of Your World.Flavor_Text:
What would I give
If I could live out of these waters?
Part of Your World.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Return a character card from your discard to your hand.

Pascal - Rapunzel's Companion.Name: Pascal - Rapunzel's Companion
Pascal - Rapunzel's Companion.Flavor_Text: A true friend is always there for you, whether you can see them or not.
Pascal - Rapunzel's Companion.Body_Text: Camouflage -  While you have another character in play, this character gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

Patch - Intimidating Pup.Name: Patch - Intimidating Pup
Patch - Intimidating Pup.Flavor_Text: Just like Thunderbolt, he'll stand up to any bad guy.
Patch - Intimidating Pup.Body_Text: Bark - {e}: Chosen character gets -2{p} until the start of your next turn.

Pawpsicle.Name: Pawpsicle
Pawpsicle.Body_Text:
Jumbo Pop: When you play this item, you may draw a card.
That's Redwood: Banish this item - Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

Perdita - Devoted Mother.Name: Perdita - Devoted Mother
Perdita - Devoted Mother.Flavor_Text: Her pups will follow her anywhere.
Perdita - Devoted Mother.Body_Text: Come Along, Children - When you play this character and whenever she quests, you may play a character with cost 2 or less from your discard for free.

Pete - Bad Guy.Name: Pete - Bad Guy
Pete - Bad Guy.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Take That!: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {s} this turn.
Who's Next?: While this character has 7 {s} or more, he gets +2 {l}.

Peter Pan - Fearless Fighter.Name: Peter Pan - Fearless Fighter
Peter Pan - Fearless Fighter.Flavor_Text: "Nobody calls Pan a coward and lives! I'll fight you man-to-man, with one hand behind my back."
Peter Pan - Fearless Fighter.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

Peter Pan - Lost Boy Leader.Name: Peter Pan - Lost Boy Leader
Peter Pan - Lost Boy Leader.Flavor_Text: The Illumineers needed someone to find a missing spellbook, and Peter was the first to volunteer.
Peter Pan - Lost Boy Leader.Body_Text: I Came To Listen To The Stories - Once per turn, when this character moves to a location, gain lore equal to that location's {l}.

Peter Pan - Never Land Hero.Name: Peter Pan - Never Land Hero
Peter Pan - Never Land Hero.Flavor_Text: With Peter, plans often meant diving headlong into danger.
Peter Pan - Never Land Hero.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

Over Here, Tink - While you have a character named Tinker Bell in play, this character gets +2{p}.

Peter Pan - Never Landing.Name: Peter Pan - Never Landing
Peter Pan - Never Landing.Flavor_Text: "What's the matter, Hook? Can't you fly?"
Peter Pan - Never Landing.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Peter Pan - Pirate's Bane.Name: Peter Pan - Pirate's Bane
Peter Pan - Pirate's Bane.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Peter Pan.)

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

You're Next! - Whenever he challenges a Pirate character, this character takes no damage from the challenge.

Peter Pan's Dagger.Name: Peter Pan's Dagger

Stitch - Covert Agent.Flavor_Text: For such a flashy dresser, he sure is hard to spot.
Stitch - Covert Agent.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Hide - While this character is at a location, he gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

Stitch - Little Rocket.Name: Stitch - Little Rocket
Stitch - Little Rocket.Flavor_Text:
"Who thought giving him power armor was a good idea?!"
-Nani
Stitch - Little Rocket.Body_Text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

Stitch - New Dog.Name: Stitch - New Dog
Stitch - New Dog.Flavor_Text:
Lilo: "David! I got a new dog!" 
David: "Auwe! . . . You sure it's a dog?" 
Lilo: "Uh-huh. He used to be a collie before he got ran over."

Stitch - Rock Star.Name: Stitch - Rock Star
Stitch - Rock Star.Flavor_Text: The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.
Stitch - Rock Star.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.) 

Adoring Fans - Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.

Stolen Scimitar.Name: Stolen Scimitar
Stolen Scimitar.Flavor_Text: Sometimes you've got to take what you can get.
Stolen Scimitar.Body_Text: Slash - {e} - Chosen character gets +1 {s} this turn. If a character named Aladdin is chosen, he get +2 {s} instead.

Stratos - Tornado Titan.Name: Stratos - Tornado Titan
Stratos - Tornado Titan.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Cyclone - {e}: Gain lore equal to the number of Titan characters you have in play.

Strength Of A Raging Fire.Name: Strength Of A Raging Fire
Strength Of A Raging Fire.Flavor_Text: Tranquil as a forest\nBut on fire within
Strength Of A Raging Fire.Body_Text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.) Deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of characters you have in play.

Strike A Good Match.Name: Strike A Good Match
Strike A Good Match.Flavor_Text:
Please bring honor to us
Please bring honor to us all
Strike A Good Match.Body_Text:
(A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Draw 2 cards, then choose and discard a card.

Sudden Chill.Name: Sudden Chill
Sudden Chill.Flavor_Text: Cruella De Vil, Cruella De Vil, If she doesn't scare you, no evil thing will
Sudden Chill.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Each opponent chooses and discards a card.

Sumerian Talisman.Name: Sumerian Talisman
Sumerian Talisman.Flavor_Text:
"Summoned spirit from the dark
Show thyself before this arc."
-Lena Sabrewing
Sumerian Talisman.Body_Text: Source Of Magic - During your turn, whenever one of your characters is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.

Sword In The Stone.Name: Sword In The Stone
Sword In The Stone.Flavor_Text: "Whoso pulleth out this sword of this stone and anvil is rightwise king born of England."
Sword In The Stone.Body_Text: {e}, 2 {i} - Chosen character gets +1 {s} this turn for each 1 damage on them.

Sword Of Truth.Name: Sword Of Truth
Sword Of Truth.Flavor_Text: Almost as powerful as True Love's Kiss.
Sword Of Truth.Body_Text: Final Enchantment - Banish this item - Banish chosen villain character.

Tamatoa - Drab Little Crab.Name: Tamatoa - Drab Little Crab
Tamatoa - Drab Little Crab.Flavor_Text: "Someday, I'll grow up to be the most crabulous crustacean the world has ever seen!"

Tamatoa - So Shiny!.Name: Tamatoa - So Shiny!
Tamatoa - So Shiny!.Flavor_Text: "Watch me dazzle like a diamond in the rough!"
Tamatoa - So Shiny!.Body_Text:
What Have We Here? - When you play this character and whenever he quests, you may return an item card from your discard to your hand.

Glam - This character gets +1 {l} for each item you have in play.

Tangle.Name: Tangle
Tangle.Flavor_Text:
"Stay right there! I mean, you don't have a choice, I guess. But still! Don't move!" 
-Rapunzel

Te Ka - Heartless.Name: Te Ka - Heartless
Te Ka - Heartless.Flavor_Text:
Maui: "Ever defeat a lava monster?" 
Moana: "No, have you?"
Te Ka - Heartless.Body_Text: Seek The Heart - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore.

Te Ka - The Burning One.Name: Te Ka - The Burning One
Te Ka - The Burning One.Flavor_Text: She burns for that which was stolen from her.
Te Ka - The Burning One.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

Teeth and Ambitions.Name: Teeth and Ambitions
Teeth and Ambitions.Flavor_Text: Of course, quid pro quo, you're expected To take certain duties on board
Teeth and Ambitions.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 2 damage to chosen character of yours to deal 2 damaged to another chosen character.

Thaddeus E. Klang - Metallic Leader.Name: Thaddeus E. Klang - Metallic Leader
Thaddeus E. Klang - Metallic Leader.Flavor_Text: "Soon the bells will ring in the sound of your doom!"
Thaddeus E. Klang - Metallic Leader.Body_Text: My Teeth Are Sharper - Whenever this character quests while at a location, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

The Bare Necessities.Name: The Bare Necessities
The Bare Necessities.Flavor_Text: Forget about your worries and your strife. . . .
The Bare Necessities.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a non-character card of your choice.

The Bayou - Mysterious Swamp.Name: The Bayou - Mysterious Swamp
The Bayou - Mysterious Swamp.Flavor_Text: A place to find what you need, not just what you want.
The Bayou - Mysterious Swamp.Body_Text: Show Me The Way - Whenever a character quests while here, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

The Beast Is Mine!.Name: The Beast Is Mine!
The Beast Is Mine!.Flavor_Text:
"It's only fitting that the finest hunter get the foulest beast!" 
-Gaston
The Beast Is Mine!.Body_Text: Chosen character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

The Boss Is On A Roll.Name: The Boss Is On A Roll
The Boss Is On A Roll.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put any number of them on the top of the bottom of your deck in any order. Gain 1 lore.

The Firebird - Force of Destruction.Name: The Firebird - Force of Destruction
The Firebird - Force of Destruction.Flavor_Text:
It rages through the forest,
Wings spread wide with flame
Spring sings its ancient chorus
And green renews its claim

The Huntsman - Reluctant Enforcer.Name: The Huntsman - Reluctant Enforcer
The Huntsman - Reluctant Enforcer.Flavor_Text: "Run away, hide! In the woods, anywhere!"
The Huntsman - Reluctant Enforcer.Body_Text: Change Of Heart: Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

The Lamp.Name: The Lamp
The Lamp.Body_Text: Good Or Evil - Banish this item: If you have a character named Jafar in play, draw 2 cards. If you have a character named Genie in play, return chosen character with cost 4 or less to their players hand.

The Most Diabolical Scheme.Name: The Most Diabolical Scheme
The Most Diabolical Scheme.Flavor_Text:
Now comes the real tour de force
Tricky and wicked, of course
The Most Diabolical Scheme.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Banish chosen Villain of your to banish chosen character.

The Nokk - Water Spirit.Name: The Nokk - Water Spirit
The Nokk - Water Spirit.Body_Text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

The Prince - Never Gives Up.Name: The Prince - Never Gives Up
The Prince - Never Gives Up.Body_Text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)\nResist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

The Queen - Commanding Presence.Name: The Queen - Commanding Presence
The Queen - Commanding Presence.Body_Text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.)

Who is the Fairest? - Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -4 {s} this turn and chosen character gets +4 {s} this turn.

The Queen - Disguised Peddler.Name: The Queen - Disguised Peddler
The Queen - Disguised Peddler.Body_Text: A Perfect Disguise: {e}, Choose and discard a character card - Gain lore equal to the discarded character's {l}.

The Queen - Hateful Rival.Name: The Queen - Hateful Rival
The Queen - Hateful Rival.Flavor_Text:
"A cobweb's strand to hold her fast
An eagle's eye to see her well
Sands of time to steal her past
Thus I cast my magic spell!"

The Queen - Mirror Seeker.Name: The Queen - Mirror Seeker
The Queen - Mirror Seeker.Flavor_Text: She has only one question, and she'd better like the answer.
The Queen - Mirror Seeker.Body_Text: Calculating And Vain - Whenever this character quests, you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

The Queen - Regal Monarch.Name: The Queen - Regal Monarch
The Queen - Regal Monarch.Flavor_Text: Don't question her. Don't doubt her. And above all, don't disobey her.

The Queen - Wicked and Vain.Name: The Queen - Wicked and Vain
The Queen - Wicked and Vain.Flavor_Text: Sublime beauty matched with peerless cunning. Is there any question who is fairest?
The Queen - Wicked and Vain.Body_Text: I Summon Thee - {e} - Draw a card.

The Queen's Castle - Mirror Chamber.Name: The Queen's Castle - Mirror Chamber
The Queen's Castle - Mirror Chamber.Flavor_Text: Those who visit the mirror can choose their question - but not the answer.
The Queen's Castle - Mirror Chamber.Body_Text: Using The Mirror - At the start of your turn, for each character you have here, you may draw a card.

The Sorcerer's Hat.Name: The Sorcerer's Hat
The Sorcerer's Hat.Flavor_Text: Minnie approached it carefully. Whoever had placed it here might have prepared traps.
The Sorcerer's Hat.Body_Text: Incredible Energy - {e}, 1{i}: Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put that card into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

The Sorcerer's Spellbook.Name: The Sorcerer's Spellbook
The Sorcerer's Spellbook.Flavor_Text: Illumineers seek the power of knowledge - but must be aware of the price.

The Sorcerer's Tower - Wondrous Workspac.Name: The Sorcerer's Tower - Wondrous Workspace
The Sorcerer's Tower - Wondrous Workspac.Flavor_Text: Everything you need to make some magic.
The Sorcerer's Tower - Wondrous Workspac.Body_Text:
Broom Closet - Your characters named Magic Broom may move here for free.

Magical Power - Characters get +1{l} while here.

The Wardrobe - Belle's Confidant.Name: The Wardrobe - Belle's Confidant
The Wardrobe - Belle's Confidant.Flavor_Text: When you simply must have the hautest couture.

Tiana - Celebrating Princess.Name: Tiana - Celebrating Princess
Tiana - Celebrating Princess.Body_Text: Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)\nWhat You Give Is What You Get: While this character is exerted and you have no cards in your hand, opponents can't play actions.

Tiana - Diligent Waitress.Name: Tiana - Diligent Waitress
Tiana - Diligent Waitress.Flavor_Text: "My place is going be special, with great food to fill people's bellies and hot jazz to feed their souls!"

Tiana - True Princess.Name: Tiana - True Princess
Tiana - True Princess.Flavor_Text: Finding your true self will set your heart aglow.

Tiana's Palace - Jazz Restaurant.Name: Tiana's Palace - Jazz Restaurant
Tiana's Palace - Jazz Restaurant.Flavor_Text: In New Orleans, dreams can come true.
Tiana's Palace - Jazz Restaurant.Body_Text: Night Out - Characters can't be challenged while here.

Tigger - One Of A Kind.Name: Tigger - One Of A Kind
Tigger - One Of A Kind.Flavor_Text: Bouncing in to save the day!
Tigger - One Of A Kind.Body_Text: Energetic: Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {s} this turn.

Tigger - Wonderful Thing.Name: Tigger - Wonderful Thing
Tigger - Wonderful Thing.Flavor_Text: "I'm the bounciest bouncer that ever bounced!"
Tigger - Wonderful Thing.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Timon - Grub Rustler.Name: Timon - Grub Rustler
Timon - Grub Rustler.Flavor_Text: "There's all manner of tasty treats in the world - ya just gotta know where to look."
Timon - Grub Rustler.Body_Text: Tastes Like Chicken - When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character.

Tinker Bell - Generous Fairy.Name: Tinker Bell - Generous Fairy
Tinker Bell - Generous Fairy.Flavor_Text: Plenty of berries - and friendship - to go around.
Tinker Bell - Generous Fairy.Body_Text: Make A New Friend - When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of our deck in any order.

Tinker Bell - Giant Fairy.Name: Tinker Bell - Giant Fairy
Tinker Bell - Giant Fairy.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.) 

ROCK THE BOAT: When you play this character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

Puny Pirate! - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen opposing character.

Tinker Bell - Most Helpful.Name: Tinker Bell - Most Helpful
Tinker Bell - Most Helpful.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) 

Pixie Dust - When you play this character, chosen character gains Evasive this turn.

Tinker Bell - Peter Pan's Ally.Name: Tinker Bell - Peter Pan's Ally
Tinker Bell - Peter Pan's Ally.Body_Text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)   Loyal and Devoted - Your characters named Peter Pan gain Challenger +1.

Tinker Bell - Tiny Tactician.Name: Tinker Bell - Tiny Tactician
Tinker Bell - Tiny Tactician.Flavor_Text: Sometimes all you need is a little tactical genius.
Tinker Bell - Tiny Tactician.Body_Text: Battle Plans - {e} - Draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

Tinker Bell - Very Clever Fairy.Name: Tinker Bell - Very Clever Fairy
Tinker Bell - Very Clever Fairy.Flavor_Text: She lives in a world of possibilities.
Tinker Bell - Very Clever Fairy.Body_Text: I Can Use That - Whenever one of your items is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Treasure Guardian - Protector of the Cav.Name: Treasure Guardian - Protector of the Cave
Treasure Guardian - Protector of the Cav.Body_Text: Who Disturbs MY Slumber? - This character can't challenge or quest unless it is at a location.

Trigger - Not-So-Sharp Shooter.Name: Trigger - Not-So-Sharp Shooter
Trigger - Not-So-Sharp Shooter.Flavor_Text:
"Criminently, Trigger! Point that peashooter the other way."
-Sheriff of Nottingham
Trigger - Not-So-Sharp Shooter.Body_Text: Old Betsy - Your characters named Nutsy get +1{l}.

Triton - The Sea King.Name: Triton - The Sea King
Triton - The Sea King.Flavor_Text: "Isn't 'Because I said so' enough of a reason?"

Tuk Tuk - Wrecking Ball.Name: Tuk Tuk - Wrecking Ball
Tuk Tuk - Wrecking Ball.Flavor_Text: A good friend is always ready to roll.
Tuk Tuk - Wrecking Ball.Body_Text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

Ursula - Deceiver.Name: Ursula - Deceiver
Ursula - Deceiver.Body_Text: You'll Never Even Miss It - When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a song card of your choice.

Ursula - Deceiver of All.Name: Ursula - Deceiver of All
Ursula - Deceiver of All.Flavor_Text: "I don't want much - just the most powerful lore!"
Ursula - Deceiver of All.Body_Text: What A Deal - Whenever this character sings a song, you may play that song again from your discard for free, then put it on the bottom of your deck.

Ursula - Power Hungry.Name: Ursula - Power Hungry
Ursula - Power Hungry.Flavor_Text: The first rule of Villainy: If you're going to be evil, you've got to have style.
Ursula - Power Hungry.Body_Text: It's Too Easy! - When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore. You may draw a card for each 1 lore lost this way.

Ursula - Sea Witch.Name: Ursula - Sea Witch
Ursula - Sea Witch.Flavor_Text: The secret contract has already been written
Ursula - Sea Witch.Body_Text: You're Too Late - Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

Ursula's Cauldron.Name: Ursula's Cauldron
Ursula's Cauldron.Flavor_Text: Perfect for mixing potions and stealing voices.
Ursula's Cauldron.Body_Text: Peer Into The Depths - {e} - Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one on the top of your deck and the other on the bottom.

Ursula's Shell Necklace.Name: Ursula's Shell Necklace
Ursula's Shell Necklace.Flavor_Text: "Singing is a lovely pastime . . . if you've got the voice for it."  - Ursula
Ursula's Shell Necklace.Body_Text: Now, Sing! - Whenever you play a song, you may pay 1 {i} to draw a card.

Vault Door.Name: Vault Door
Vault Door.Flavor_Text: Only Scrooge knows about this vault. And he's going to keep it that way.
Vault Door.Body_Text: Sealed Away - Your locations and characters at locations gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

Vicious Betrayal.Name: Vicious Betrayal
Vicious Betrayal.Flavor_Text:
"A true king takes matters into his own claws."
 -Scar
Vicious Betrayal.Body_Text: Chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn. If a villain character is chosen, they get +3 {s} instead.

Virana - Fang Chief.Name: Virana - Fang Chief
Virana - Fang Chief.Flavor_Text: "I must make the hard decisions to protect my daughter, especially in this unfamiliar world."

Voyage.Name: Voyage
Voyage.Body_Text: Move up to 2 characters of yours to the same location for free.

Webby Vanderquack - Enthusiastic Duck.Name: Webby Vanderquack - Enthusiastic Duck
Webby Vanderquack - Enthusiastic Duck.Flavor_Text: "Finding lore is a lot easier when you have a grappling hook!"

Weight Set.Name: Weight Set
Weight Set.Body_Text: Training - Whenever you play a character with 4 {s} or more, you may pay 1 {i} to draw a card.

Wendy Darling - Authority on Peter Pan.Name: Wendy Darling - Authority on Peter Pan
Wendy Darling - Authority on Peter Pan.Body_Text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

Wendy Darling - Talented Sailor.Name: Wendy Darling - Talented Sailor
Wendy Darling - Talented Sailor.Flavor_Text: With Tink's upgrades in place, Wendy took them to the skies to find the missing mermaid.

What Did You Call Me?.Name: What Did You Call Me?
What Did You Call Me?.Flavor_Text:
"No one can have a higher opinion of your than I have, and I think you're a slimy, contemptible sewer rat!"
 - Basil
What Did You Call Me?.Body_Text: Chosen damaged character gets +3 {s} this turn.

White Rabbit's Pocket Watch.Name: White Rabbit's Pocket Watch
White Rabbit's Pocket Watch.Flavor_Text: "No wonder you're late. Why, this watch is exactly two days slow." - The Mad Hatter
White Rabbit's Pocket Watch.Body_Text: I'm Late! - {e}, 1{i} - Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

Wildcat - Mechanic.Name: Wildcat - Mechanic
Wildcat - Mechanic.Flavor_Text: "I can take anything apart in under 5 minutes!"
Wildcat - Mechanic.Body_Text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Disassemble - {e}: Banish chosen item.

Wildcat's Wrench.Name: Wildcat's Wrench
Wildcat's Wrench.Flavor_Text: The right tool makes all the difference.
Wildcat's Wrench.Body_Text: Rebuild - {e}: Remove up to 2 damage from chosen location.

Winnie The Pooh - Having A Think.Name: Winnie The Pooh - Having A Think
Winnie The Pooh - Having A Think.Flavor_Text: When he though, he though in the most thoughtful way he could think.
Winnie The Pooh - Having A Think.Body_Text: Hunny Pot: Whenever this character quests, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

Winnie The Pooh - Hunny Wizard.Name: Winnie The Pooh - Hunny Wizard
Winnie The Pooh - Hunny Wizard.Flavor_Text: He'd always felt a kinship with honey. They were both golden, and sweet, and likely to end up in sticky situations.

Work Together.Name: Work Together
Work Together.Flavor_Text:
Pacho: "Put your whole back into it!" 
Kuzco: "This is my whole back!"
Work Together.Body_Text: Chosen Character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

World's Greatest Criminal Mind.Name: World's Greatest Criminal Mind
World's Greatest Criminal Mind.Body_Text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)  Banish chosen character with 5 {s} or more.

You Can Fly!.Name: You Can Fly!
You Can Fly!.Body_Text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

You Have Forgotten Me.Name: You Have Forgotten Me
You Have Forgotten Me.Flavor_Text:
"You are more than what you have become."
- Mufasa
You Have Forgotten Me.Body_Text: Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.

Yzma - Alchemist.Name: Yzma - Alchemist
Yzma - Alchemist.Flavor_Text: "When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"
Yzma - Alchemist.Body_Text: You're Excused - Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck

Yzma - Scary Beyond All Reason.Name: Yzma - Scary Beyond All Reason
Yzma - Scary Beyond All Reason.Body_Text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma)
Cruel Irony: When you play this character, shuffle another chosen character card into their player's deck. That player draws 2 cards.

Yzma - Without Beauty Sleep.Name: Yzma - Without Beauty Sleep
Yzma - Without Beauty Sleep.Flavor_Text:
Yzma: "Llamas! All I see when I close my eyes is llamas!"
Kronk: "Weird. I just saw one in the flood. Poor little guy."

Zazu - Steward of the Pride Lands.Name: Zazu - Steward of the Pride Lands
Zazu - Steward of the Pride Lands.Flavor_Text: "I'd be lyin' if I said I ran the place, but welcome to the Pride Lands all the same!"
Zazu - Steward of the Pride Lands.Body_Text: It's Time To Go! - While this character is at a location, he gets +1{l}.

Zero to Hero.Name: Zero to Hero
Zero to Hero.Body_Text:
{A character with cost X or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Count the number of characters you have in play. You pay that amount of {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

Zeus - God of Lightning.Name: Zeus - God of Lightning
Zeus - God of Lightning.Flavor_Text: "A little lightning solves a whole lot of problems."
Zeus - God of Lightning.Body_Text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Challenger +4 (While challenging, this character get +4 {s}.)
